title: 'Spec' object has no attribute 'lapack_libs'
body:
I am seeing this weird error:

```
==> Building planck-likelihood [Package]
==> Executing phase : 'install'
==> Error: AttributeError: 'Spec' object has no attribute 'lapack_libs'
/xfs1/applications/spack/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/planck-likelihood/package.py:101, in install:
     89       def install(self, spec, prefix):
     90           # Configure
     91           makeflags = [
     92               'PREFIX=%s' % prefix,
     93               'CFITSIOPATH=%s' % spec['cfitsio'].prefix,
     94               'CC=cc',
     95               'FC=fc',
     96               'IFORTLIBPATH=',
     97               'IFORTRUNTIME=-lintlc -limf -lsvml -liomp5 -lifportmt -lifcoremt',
     98               'GFORTRANLIBPATH=',
     99               'GFORTRANRUNTIME=-lgfortran -lgomp',
     100              'LAPACKLIBPATH=',
  >> 101              'LAPACK=%s' % (spec['lapack'].lapack_libs +
     102                             spec['blas'].blas_libs).ld_flags,
     103              'COPENMP=%s' % self.compiler.openmp_flag,
     104              'FOPENMP=%s' % self.compiler.openmp_flag,
     105          ]
     106
     107          # Build
     108          make(*makeflags)
     109
     110          # Install
     111          make('install', *makeflags)
     112          fix_darwin_install_name(prefix.lib)
     113          dirs = ['plc_2.0']
     114          if '+lensing-ext' in spec:
     115              dirs.append('lensing_ext')
     116          if '+plik-DS' in spec:
     117              dirs.append('plik_DS')
     118          if '+plik-HM-ext' in spec:
     119              dirs.append('plik_HM_ext')
     120          if '+plik-unbinned' in spec:
     121              dirs.append('plik_unbinned')
     122          for dir in dirs:
     123              install_tree(dir, join_path(prefix, 'share', 'clik', dir))
```

Do you have any pointers as to what might be causing this? It happens on Linux, but not on Darwin.
